block.p: Christina Maria Gerney, the daughter of Brigitte Gerney of New York and the late Arkadi Gerney, was married yesterday to Eric Christopher Dillmann, the son of Susan and Dr. Christopher Dillmann of Williamstown, Mass. The Rev. Paula Peterson, an interfaith minister, performed the ceremony in the rose garden of the bride's mother's house in Southampton, L.I.

The bride and her husband graduated from the Maryland Institute College of Art. Mrs. Gerney-Dillmann, 24, is a painter in Manchester, Vt. Her father was the president of J. Gerney & Company, a former New York-based manufacturers' representative company in the steel industry.
